tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "93235A274AAD6EB4A1CE2E8848D4AAFC", "Congratulations, you\'ve been elected Mayor! Mayors have access to systems and services to help manage your Node. You can find them in the Citizenship Menu.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "24AEBD2B4AC3887B191AABBB6F9DA5A7", "The Treasury tab now allows you to manage citizenship dues, tax rates, and create buy orders for additional node resources.")
NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "3BCFCE1C4DB8B1316D435E82CE4B431D", "In the Buildings tab, you can now initiate new construction, upgrade, or demolish Service Buildings in the Node.")
NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "1E597B4543EC8F1D20ED0C8482794D8C", "The Node Relationships tab now allows you to use War Declaration scrolls to start a Node War with enemy nodes.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "8766716C44A309D84D08DABDDC01B560", "Lastly, the Mayoral Commissions tab allows you to create commissions that shape the growth and relationships of your Node.")
